Text: I'm going to download! :) THanks for this!!!!!! :D
Can you please tell me how to play the .m4v file? I tried installing k-lite codec pack and still cannot play the file. Any tips?
.m4v is typically an itunes play file, but a file converter could change that. my suggestion is either get itunes (which i used to play it), or get some converter like super converter
Or download VLC media player, it can play just about anything.
BTW thanks for the upload. Will be seeding for a long time.
